I think that you have a great idea
some things to consider:

1) in the past=
 we've had chats based on appointments because some of 
us live in differen=
t states and countries however we never realize 
that sometimes the chats g=
enerate new details based on our questions 
to more knowledgeable members (=
those who know Japanese or have 
studied this topic for a long time)

2) so=
 you may want to consider asking all participants if they are 
willing to h=
ave their chats be stored and posted for those who cannot 
attend chats---o=
r if not then perhaps we can replace their names with 
anonymous labels

3)=
 you may also want to make use of the forums in existence for 
example ther=
e is a forum here:  http://www.hajimenokizu and post 
questions there too

=
4) if a chat is designed to be more history based then some members 
may wa=
nt to introduce themselves to -prevent- misunderstandings 
(because we are =
all typing and we can't hear each other's voices and 
figure out the other =
person's tone)

I will use myself as an example

****if someone asks me a h=
istory question on a topic I feel 
comfortable in answering---I will use wh=
atever information I know 
from reading texts in English (just because we k=
now where the info 
comes from)--I may in fact ****AGREE WITH YOU**** on a =
{personal} 
level however I will ignore my own gut feeling until I can prov=
e it 
somehow 

****however if you want me to SPECULATE in a fictional sens=
e (like if 
someone wants a plot bunny for a fic) I can do so just like any=
 other 
fangirl---and then some!!! like I have 100 theories for everything =

(but I also have fangirl speculation vs. speculation using history as 
a f=
ramework) too

****what I'm saying is when we discuss these Shinsengumi top=
ics be 
aware that many of us can assume many, many, many stances---and whe=
n 
we state something it is not some attack on person---but trying 
to "thi=
nk out loud" to figure out something---that's how we learn

and thank you B=
unny for always contributing to the timeline which is 
undergoing revision.=
...again (^_^)

Bunny you should also feel free to take the lead too if you=
 feel that 
there will be alot of interest --- and please encourage people =
not to 
be so shy!!!

@...> wrote:

ll to

nt

the=
 presistant fans that keep the mailing lists going  strong.  My 
idea was, =
how 'bout we make a chatroom?    Maybe not on the actual 
site but on mIRC.=
.. Somewhere were we can all  meet and chit chat 
about everything and anyt=
hing that comes to  mind.   It'll be a great 
way to get to know the memebe=
rs of  the 3 mailing lists.   What do 
you guys think?
